com.teamviewer.sdk.screensharing.api

extends Object
    Factory for creating new sessions.

    • Method Detail

      • createTVSession

        public static void createTVSession(Activity activity,
                   String sdkToken,
                   TVSessionCreationCallback callback)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                   IllegalStateException
        Asynchronously creates a new TVSession instance. The provided SDK token will be validated during the process. After creation the corresponding method on the provided callback will be invoked. The session must be started by calling TVSession.start(TVSessionConfiguration) on the TVSession instance delivered by the callback.

        Note that subsequent calls to this method, when either a session is in the process of being created or a session is currently running will result in a TVCreationError.SESSION_ALREADY_RUNNING error on the callback.

        Parameters:
        activity - The currently visible activity. Must not be null.
        sdkToken - A valid SDK Token which was created in the TeamViewer Management Console. Must not be null.
        callback - The callback to be invoked after session creation either succeeded or failed, must not be null. Will run on the main thread.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If parameters are not initialized correctly.
        IllegalStateException - If permissions or the TVSessionService are missing the app's manifest. Please refer to Manifest requirements
